title: 💥 112學年度畢業典禮🎉事前報名且當日全程參與，享有Apple好禮抽獎資格 🎁
department: 學務處畢業生及校友服務組
author: 溫小姐
content:
分類： 其他公告
來源： 學務處畢業生及校友服務組 - 溫小姐 - fengting0804@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6282
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 💥 112學年度畢業典禮🎉事前報名且當日全程參與，享有Apple好禮抽獎資格 🎁
日期： Fri, 17 May 2024 11:33:13 +0800
附檔： 112學年度畢業典禮網頁資訊.png (30 KB)   
親愛的應屆畢業同學👨‍🎓👩‍🎓，您們好：
Dear graduating students,

東華大學的畢業典禮即將來臨啦，這可是個超重要又值得慶祝的日子喔！
這次的活動時間是在2024年6月1日（星期六）下午4點 ，全校性的畢業典禮就在體育館舉行啦！
The graduation ceremony at National Dong Hwa University is coming soon, and it is a highly honorable and celebratory day! 
The event will take place on June 1, 2024 (Saturday), at 4 PM sharp in the university gymnasium.

我們超誠摯地邀請你一起來參加這個睽違以久的盛大活動！另外，聽說這次的畢業典禮校長特別準備了一場超級抽獎活動給本屆畢業生！你猜猜有什麼獎品？
嘿嘿🤭，有Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max（256G）6.7吋手機一台、Apple iPad Air（64G）平板電腦兩台、Apple iPad mini（64G）平板電腦一台，還有Apple HomePod Mini智慧音箱3組！太誘人了吧！
We sincerely invite you to join us for this long-awaited grand event! Furthermore, we've heard that the university president has specially prepared a super lucky draw for this year's graduates! What prizes are up for grabs? Hehe, they include one Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max (256G) with a 6.7-inch display, two Apple iPad Airs (64G) tablets, one Apple iPad mini (64G) tablet, and an Apple HomePod Mini (3 sets)! It is incredibly tempting.

✨對了❗️❗️這次抽獎只限今年的畢業生參加喔！需事前報名，當天親自來現場全程參與畢業典禮並著學位袍才有機會抽獎和領獎喔！
By the way, this lucky draw is only for this year's graduates!  Please wear your graduation gown on-site to qualify for the prize drawings.

🎯【112學年度畢業典禮】專屬網頁訊息，提供畢業典禮所有相關資訊，歡迎查詢。
活動網址：  http://reurl.cc/2Yb4z4
🎯【112th Graduation Ceremony】Dedicated Webpage Information, Providing All Relevant Details of the Graduation Ceremony. Feel free to browse.
website:  http://reurl.cc/2Yb4z4

學務處畢服組 敬邀您一同參與🫶
The Graduation Dress Committee of the Division of Student Affairs invites you to participate together.
